title: The Hunter by Chris Carter (Retail - Request) {Rose88}
description:
Title: The Hunter
Author: Chris Carter
Published: Jan 2013
Publisher: Simon & Schuster 
ISBN: 978-1-47112-800-4
Format: Epub (Retail)
Language: English
Genres: Fiction, Mystery, Thriller

(*Request*)

A thrilling ebook exclusive short story from Sunday Times bestselling author Chris Carter. Meet Robert Hunter, the youngest Homicide Detective the Los Angeles Police has ever recruited, on his first day. As a rookie, he is given a simple suicide investigation to cut his teeth on. But when he arrives at the scene, he swiftly begins to suspect that something is not quite right.

Despite the fact that the door was locked from the inside, and there is no other way out of the apartment, Hunter has a hunch that the victim did not commit suicide. But with a new Captain to impress and the evidence stacked against him, Hunter has a lot to prove if he is to solve the case and keep his place on the team.
